notes: Upscale modern apartment with excellent finishes including recessed LED lighting, polished tile floors, and contemporary furniture. Very spacious layout with open living/dining/kitchen area and at least two bedrooms. Good natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows. For baby safety, the glass coffee table has sharp corners and slippery tile floors could be concerns; no visible balcony railings or stairs in photos. Listed by Elegant Realty (expat housing agency), which suggests a quality building likely with elevator on 6th floor.
